Get.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_CsIncident WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND incident_id = @incident_id

GetCsIncidentByUserId.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_CsIncident WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND user_id = @user_id

GetCsGroupIdByIncidentId.Statement: SELECT cs_group_id FROM w2_CsIncident WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND incident_id = @incident_id

Update.Statement: UPDATE w2_CsIncident SET user_id = @user_id ,incident_category_id = @incident_category_id ,incident_title = @incident_title ,status = @status ,voc_id = @voc_id ,voc_memo = @voc_memo ,comment = @comment ,importance = @importance ,user_name = @user_name ,user_contact = @user_contact ,cs_group_id = @cs_group_id ,operator_id = @operator_id ,lock_status = @lock_status ,lock_operator_id = @lock_operator_id ,valid_flg = @valid_flg ,date_last_received = @date_last_received ,date_completed = @date_completed ,date_changed = GETDATE() ,last_changed = @last_changed WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND incident_id = @incident_id

UpdateIncidentByIncidentIds.Statement: UPDATE w2_CsIncident SET incident_category_id = CASE WHEN @incident_category_id = 'notupdate' THEN incident_category_id ELSE @incident_category_id END, status = CASE WHEN @status = 'notupdate' THEN status ELSE @status END, cs_group_id = CASE WHEN @cs_group_id = 'notupdate' THEN cs_group_id ELSE @cs_group_id END, operator_id = CASE WHEN @operator_id = 'notupdate' THEN operator_id ELSE @operator_id END, date_changed = GETDATE(), last_changed = @last_changed WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_CsIncident.incident_id IN (@@incident_ids@@)

CountTask.Statement:
SELECT w2_CsIncident.status, w2_CsIncident.operator_id, w2_CsIncident.valid_flg, COUNT(w2_CsIncident.incident_id) AS row_count FROM w2_CsIncident WHERE w2_CsIncident.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_CsIncident.operator_id = @operator_id AND w2_CsIncident.valid_flg = '1' GROUP BY w2_CsIncident.status, w2_CsIncident.operator_id, w2_CsIncident.valid_flg
SELECT w2_CsIncident.status, @operator_id AS operator_id, w2_CsIncident.valid_flg, COUNT(w2_CsIncident.incident_id) AS row_count FROM w2_CsIncident WHERE w2_CsIncident.dept_id = @dept_id AND ( w2_CsIncident.operator_id = @operator_id OR ( @include_unassigned_group_task = '1' AND w2_CsIncident.cs_group_id = '' ) @@ cs_group_ids_condition @@ ) AND w2_CsIncident.valid_flg = '1' GROUP BY w2_CsIncident.status, w2_CsIncident.valid_flg
